name: Find It (Reza Ebrahimi)
description:
Welcome to the world of mind games and puzzles

Do you think you are smart enough to recognize the subtle differences between images? How many differences can you find in two photos in a minute?

The picture on the left side is the original photo and the one on the right has been slightly modified. To go to the next level, you must find all the differences in the pictures.

Main Concept

In “Find It”, the game is expected to guess the differences between the first picture (original picture) to the other picture in order to arrive at the correct or fun solution of the puzzle.

Designed by:  Reza Ebrahimi
